title: Shameless promotion of others (stock photos)
content:
I have a friend who works for Getty Images here in Chicago. She's going to be in the Bay area from 22 October through 25 October on busines. Doing whatever those people do.   
   
If anyone uses stock photo - or works for a company who uses stock - feel free to get in touch with her. Her name's Karen Mendlik & she can be contacted on her cell: 773.454.2280.   
   
[Disclaimer: The views of the company promoted above are not necessarily those of Nathan Matteson. Nor should it be implied that he likes their photos.]
author: matteson
